info.description: The Exposure Service is responsible for insurance exposure data primarily used on policies. Exposures only exist under an ExposureGroup.
info.title: Exposure Service Service API

get.summary: Retrieves the AdditionalCoverages list that match the given Exposure Type and Category
get.description: Gets paged coverage types based on the Expsure Type Code and Category given.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

parameters.name: exposureCode
parameters.description: exposureCode

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: category

get.summary: Retrieves the AdditionalCoverages list that match the given Exposure Type excluding the given Category
get.description: Gets paged coverage types based on the Exposure Type Code and the category to exclude given.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

parameters.name: exposureCode
parameters.description: exposureCode

parameters.name: categoryToExclude
parameters.description: categoryToExclude

get.summary: Retrieves the ExposureGroup specified by id provided
get.description: Gets the Exposure Group with the given id.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: exposureGroupId
parameters.description: ID of the ExposureGroup

delete.description: Deletes the Exposure Group with the given id.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: exposureGroupId
parameters.description: ID of the ExposureGroup

patch.description: Updates the exposure group with the given id. The updated Exposure Group will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: exposureGroupId
parameters.description: Id of the Exposure Group to be updated

parameters.name: patch
parameters.description: A JSON Patch to update an existing Exposure Group

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description:
Version timestamp of the Exposure group you are trying to update. If this version does not match the version on the server your patch will be rejected.
 Example: 1970-01-01T00:00:00.000Z

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

id.description: Unique id of the Additional Coverage

exposureTypeId.description: Id of the referenced Exposure Type

createdOn.description: Timestamp of when the Additional coverage was created

updatedOn.description: Timestamp of when the Additional coverage was updated

name.description: English text of the Additional Coverage

additionalInterestNumber.description: The number of the additional interest that is interested in an item

itemNumber.description: The number of the additional interest item that the additional interest is interested in

AdditionalInterestRelationshipV1.description: The object representing the relationship between and additional interest and an additional interest item

country.description: The country name component. When specified, the value MUST be in ISO 3166-1 'alpha-2' code format [ISO3166]

formatted.example:
100 Universal City Plaza
Hollywood, CA 91608 USA
formatted.description: The full mailing address, formatted for display or use with a mailing label. This attribute MAY contain newlines.

postalCode.description: The zip code or postal code component.

region.description: The state, province or region component. Administrative division, within a country; a state or province.

streetAddress.description: The main street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box.

streetAddress2.description: The second line of a full address. The unit, apartment, building, etc. any secondary address component.

deductibleAmount.description: The deductible amount for the additional coverage

generalAggregateLimit.description: The general aggregate limit for the additional coverage

limit.description: The dollar amount total limit of coverage

name.description: The name of the additional coverage

otherLimit.description: Other amount limit for the additional coverage

perPersonLimit.description: The per person limit for the additional coverage

hasHeating.description: If the building improvement included heating

hasOther.description: If the building has an additional improvement

hasPlumbing.description: If the building improvement included plumbing

hasRoofing.description: If the building improvement included roofing

hasWiring.description: If the building improvement included wiring

heatingYear.description: The year the heating improvement was added

otherYear.description: The year the additional improvement was added

plumbingYear.description: The year the plumbing improvement was added

roofingYear.description: The year the roofing improvement was added

wiringYear.description: The year the wiring improvement was added

buildingName.description: The business owners policy building name

itemNumber.description: The client assigned identifier of the Additional Interest Item. It is not case sensitive.

deductible2Amount.description: The deductible amount for the standard coverage

limit.description: The limit for the standard coverage

propertyDamageDeductible.description: The property damage deductible in dollars

ProfessionalLiabilityV1.description: Professional Liability Insurance Object. Professional liability insurance (PLI) is insurance that protects professionals such as accountants, lawyers, and physicians against negligence and other claims initiated by their clients. Professionals who have expertise in a specific area require this type of insurance because general liability insurance policies do not offer protection against claims arising out of business or professional practices such as negligence, malpractice, or misrepresentation.
